= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *BMA.VN* || Vestibular Nucleus || Equilibrium, Postural Reflexes || Pons ||
|| *BMA.IO* || Inferior Olivary Nucleus || Proprioception Relay from Spinal Cord to Cerebellum || ||
|| *BMA.PBN* || Parabrachial Nucleus || Source of short-latency nociceptive input || ||
|| *BMA.CL* || Clarke's Nucleus || Major relay to CR for unconscious proprioception || Posterior thoracic nucleus ||
|| *BMA.CN* || Cuneate Nucleus || Carry fine touch and proprioceptive information from upper body || ||
|| *BMA.GN* || Gracilis Nucleus || Carry epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body || ||
|| (ignore) || Motor Nucleus of Vagus || Parasympathetic vagal functions in the gastrointestinal tract, lungs || ||
